field.name: summary
field.value: Race condition caused by View Component's cache

field.name: description
field.value: This bug will be appeared when the page uses any view component. Although the RailsFacility ensures the life style of controllers and components are Transient, but in AbstractComponentDirective, the component was a private instance field, and the every directive is a singleton because it is cached, so the Context of component in AbstractComponentDirective is not thread safe. I created a patch that modified the codes in NVelocityViewEngine, make every directive's view component and context stored in HttpContext.Items for every request, it seems works fine now.

comment.text: This is a duplicate of issue fix #352, which was accepted.
